summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE AT ABOUT 30 MILES AN HOUR ON A CITY STREET, I START SLOWING DOWN AT A STOP SIGN AND AT ABOUT  10 MILES AN HOUR THE POWER IN MY CAR TURNS COMPLETELY OFF ENGINE TURNS OFF, LIGHTS TURN OFF, INSIDE LIGHTS TURN OFF, I LET THE CAR ROLL TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD PUT THE CAR ON PARK THEN TURN THE IGNITION TO SEE IF THEY'LL TURN ON. THE CAR DOES TURN BACK ON SO I CONTINUE ON MY WAY. THIS HAS HAPPENED TWICE IN THE LAST 3 WEEKS EVERY TIME IT HAS HAPPENED THE CAR HAS ALWAYS BEEN IN MOTION THE LIGHTS FLICKER AND THEN IT SHUTS OFF.
